title: Total brand value major sports leagues ( NFL , MLB , NBA & NHL ) 2013
summary: The statistic compares the Total Brand value of North Sports League in 2013 .
The Total Brand value of teams the National_Football_League League was at 9131.8 million U.S. dollars .
A Brand is defined here as the trademark and associated intellectual property .
gold: The statistic compares the total brand value of North American sports leagues in 2013.
All teams of the National Football League had a combined brand value of 9.1 billion U.S. dollars.
A brand is defined here as the trademark and associated intellectual property .
